## gocan apps

List the applications associated with a scene

```
gocan apps [flags]
```

### Examples

```
gocan apps --scene myscene
```

### Options

```
      --csv            get the results in csv format
  -h, --help           help for apps
  -s, --scene string   Scene name
```
